headline: FirstEnergy Names Michael Ausere Vice President, Financial Planning and Analysis
summary: AKRON, Ohio - FirstEnergy Corp. announced today that Michael Ausere has been named Vice President, Financial Planning and Analysis, effective June 2.In this role, Ausere will have responsibility for...
